description: User clicked 'Get Started' on the welcome step of onboarding, beginning their journey through the onboarding flow
User selected their role (creator, influencer, founder, or other) during onboarding, providing key user segmentation data
User selected their goals (increase followers, launch product, build community, get sponsor deal) during onboarding
User completed the entire onboarding flow and navigated to dashboard - key conversion event
User created a new task in the home page task list
User initiated YouTube account connection from the integrations page
User disconnected their YouTube account from the integrations page - potential churn signal
User selected a video file for upload in the multi-platform publishing workflow
User removed/cancelled a video upload before publishing
User selected or deselected a platform (YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn) for video publishing
User clicked 'Publish Now' to publish video to selected platforms - key conversion event
User saved their video upload as a draft instead of publishing immediately
